fields.name: Compression
fields.description: The event hub messages compression type

fields.name: DataFormat
fields.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

fields.name: DatabaseRouting
fields.description: Indication for database routing information from the data connection, by default only database routing information is allowed

fields.name: EventHubResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the event hub to be used to create a data connection.

fields.name: EventSystemProperties
fields.description: System properties of the event hub

fields.name: ManagedIdentityObjectId
fields.description: The object ID of the managedIdentityResourceId

fields.name: ManagedIdentityResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of a managed identity (system or user assigned) to be used to authenticate with event hub.

fields.name: MappingRuleName
fields.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

fields.name: RetrievalStartDate
fields.description: When defined, the data connection retrieves existing Event hub events created since the Retrieval start date. It can only retrieve events retained by the Event hub, based on its retention period.

fields.name: TableName
fields.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.
